issue.title: [CF 1143] Backpack is open condition
issue.body:
Would it be possible to add a condition to the addon to check if the main backpack is open or not?


> Posted by CurseForge user BluBluBluBlu | Imported from CurseForge issue #1143 | Raw

comments.body:
Make a Lua condition:

``` ContainerFrame1:IsVisible() ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
